contents: My master thesis: Musical Word Embedding for Music Tagging and Retrieval has been submitted to IEEE Transactions on Multimedia
Two Papers have been accepted to ICASSP 2023 (Proceedings)
I'm starting a research internship at NaverCorp (Now AI Team). Collaborate with Jeong Choi
As a visiting ph.D student, I will visit the NYU Data Science Center. Collaborate with Prof. Kyunghyun Cho.
I'm starting a research internship at ByteDance (Speech, Audio, and Music Intelligence Team). Collaborate with Keunwoo Choi, and MinzWon
